channel.title: Eradication || A new break to PI
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mha8uu.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Story behind Eradication[/b][/size] Since the release of AbstractPK and the positive feedback the community has gave me, It's made me decide to start working with it again, a new approach to the server. I wish to advance my java skills and start to create new and unique features that make the economy run a whole lot smoother. [i]Note: I'm not going to promise that this project will be finished fast or even finished to the standards I want it too, It all depends on how well it goes. (It [b]will[/b] be released when I'm finished with it.)[/i]
[left][size=12pt][b]Game Features[/b][/size][/left]
[size=12pt][b]Combat[/b][/size] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] Combat will be looked at after I am happy with the skilling changes and the way the server is layed out. Since most Project Insanity bases tend to focus more on the Player killing then the economical side to it.
[hr]
[size=12pt][b]Skilling[/b][/size] [i]Please remember that I wonder bother including the skills I haven't changed, I'll only include the ones I have to save the length of the thread.[/i]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Farming[/b][/size] Started to work on using the tools and added the little green dood, just need to make him note your herbs when used on him as well as the interface for storing.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Herblore[/b][/size] Started work on some secondary ingredients, seems to be going well.
[size=14pt][b]Mediaaaa[/b][/size] [img]http://i1186.photobucket.com/albums/z365/Rub_My_Ox/step1.jpg[/img] Using that until I take some new images. [/center]

item.title: Eradication || A new break to PI
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:426359”]It’s logic sort of though…

person a with high combat gets bored
person b says try to skill some then
person a goes and does agility for a while, gets bored cause hes done it before on another server
person a leaves
person b starts to get bored as well

well you get the drift…[/quote]

Yeah aha.
Well since I’ve fixed the bugs that I’ve noticed with skilling, I’ll work on PVM and other mini-games. ;P. Hopefully new images today

Read full topic

item.title: Eradication || A new break to PI
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[center]

[size=12pt]Story behind Eradication[/size]
Since the release of AbstractPK and the positive feedback the community has gave me, It’s made me decide to start working with it again, a new approach to the server. I wish to advance my java skills and start to create new and unique features that make the economy run a whole lot smoother.
Note: I’m not going to promise that this project will be finished fast or even finished to the standards I want it too, It all depends on how well it goes. (It will be released when I’m finished with it.)

[left][size=12pt]Game Features[/size][/left]

[size=12pt]Combat[/size]
Combat will be looked at after I am happy with the skilling changes and the way the server is layed out. Since most Project Insanity bases tend to focus more on the Player killing then the economical side to it.

[hr]

[size=12pt]Skilling[/size]
Please remember that I wonder bother including the skills I haven’t changed, I’ll only include the ones I have to save the length of the thread.

[size=10pt]Farming[/size]
Started to work on using the tools and added the little green dood, just need to make him note your herbs when used on him as well as the interface for storing.

[size=10pt]Herblore[/size]
Started work on some secondary ingredients, seems to be going well.

[size=14pt]Mediaaaa[/size]

Using that until I take some new images.
[/center]
